name: Cedar Privacy Fence
heroSubtitle: Naturally rot-resistant. No chemicals. 30-40 year lifespan. The premium choice for Toledo homeowners who want the best.

seo.title: Cedar Fence Installation Toledo OH | Northern Michigan Cedar | Ghareeb Fencing
seo.description: Premium Northern Michigan White Cedar fence installation in Toledo OH. 30-40+ year lifespan, naturally rot-resistant, no chemicals. Free quotes.

overview.title: Why Northern White Cedar?
overview.content: Northern White Cedar (Thuja occidentalis) is nature's answer to the perfect fence material. Sourced from the forests of Northern Michigan, this remarkable wood contains natural oils called thujaplicins that make it resistant to rot, decay, and insectsâ€”without any chemical treatment.
overview.additionalContent: Unlike pressure-treated pine that relies on ACQ chemicals for protection, cedar is naturally equipped to withstand decades of exposure to rain, snow, and temperature swings. That's why our cedar fences last 30-40+ years while typical treated wood fences need replacement after 15-20 years.
features: Natural decay resistance - No chemicals needed
Dimensional stability - Won't warp or twist like pine
Beautiful grain patterns - Ages to a distinguished silver-gray
Lightweight yet strong - Easier installation, less stress on posts

comparison.title: Cedar vs. Other Wood Options
comparison.subtitle: We carry all three wood types so you can compare them side-by-side at your estimate

styles.name: Board-on-Board Privacy
styles.description: Overlapping 1Ã—6 pickets with 1" overlapâ€”zero visibility gaps from any angle. Our most popular style for full privacy. Available in 6' or 8' heights.

styles.name: Shadowbox (Good Neighbor)
styles.description: Alternating boards on opposite sides create the same beautiful appearance from both yards. 1" gap allows airflow while maintaining privacy.

styles.name: Lattice Top Privacy
styles.description: Solid privacy panels topped with decorative lattice for added elegance and airflow. A customer favorite in upscale Toledo neighborhoods.

styles.name: Dog Ear
styles.description: Classic pointed-top pickets for traditional American style. Clean, simple lines at an accessible price point.

sections.title: Year 1-2
sections.content: Fresh cedar has natural golden-brown color. No treatment required. If you want to preserve the original color, apply a UV-protective clear sealer.

sections.title: Year 3+
sections.content: Cedar naturally weathers to a beautiful silver-gray. Many homeowners prefer this look. To restore original color, apply cedar-tone stain or bleach and reseal.

sections.title: Annual Check
sections.content: Inspect for loose boards, hardware wear, and gate alignment. Our 3-year warranty covers workmanship issues.

faqs.question: How long does a cedar fence last in Toledo weather?
faqs.answer: Northern White Cedar fences typically last 30-40+ years in Toledo's climate. The natural oils (thujaplicins) in cedar make it extremely resistant to rot, decay, and insects without any chemical treatment.

faqs.question: Does cedar need to be sealed or stained?
faqs.answer: No, cedar fences do not require sealing or staining. Left natural, cedar will weather to an attractive silver-gray color. If you prefer to maintain the original golden-brown color, you can apply a UV-protective sealer.

faqs.question: What's the difference between Northern White Cedar and Western Red Cedar?
faqs.answer: Northern White Cedar (what we use) has superior rot resistance and dimensional stability compared to Western Red Cedar. It shrinks only 2.2% compared to 4-8% for other woods, meaning less warping and twisting over time.

faqs.question: Can I stain my cedar fence immediately after installation?
faqs.answer: Yes! Unlike pressure-treated wood that requires 6-12 months to dry before staining, cedar can be finished immediately after installation.
